summary: WHILE DRIVING AT 55 MPH CONSUMER FELT A VIOLENT TUG ORIGINATING FROM THE REAR OF VEHICLE.  UPON LOOKING THROUGH THE REAR VIEW MIRROR  CONSUMER SAW THE TRAILER AND TWO JET SKIS CRASHING TO THE GROUND.   INSURANCE RECONSTRUCTION INVESTIGATOR CONCLUDED THAT THE WELDED SEAMS OF TRAILER WERE CONSTRUCTED POORLY. THE TRAILER WAS BEING PULLED BY A 2000 FORD 150 PICKUP TRUCK.*AK
